TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HtmlWindow extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示包含一个或多个 实例的逻辑窗口。

span.span: Represents the logical window that contains one or more instances of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不应与在 Windows 窗体或 Win32 API; 中的窗口的概念相混淆没有任何`HWND`或类似直接对应的实例的 Windows 资源。 should not be confused with the concept of a window in Windows Forms or the Win32 API; there is no `HWND` or similar Windows resource that corresponds directly to an instance of . 相反，上用户的屏幕，以及用于与通过提示和对话框的用户进行交互的方法提供的文档的位置的高级说明。Rather, provides high-level descriptions of a document's location on a user's screen, as well as methods for interacting with users by way of prompts and dialog boxes. 充当 Web 页面的文档和其元数据，如文档的位置和 Web 浏览器的功能的逻辑容器。 acts as a logical container for a Web page's documents and its metadata, such as the document's location and the capabilities of the Web browser. 一种 Web 页包含单个文档，或者`FRAMESET`包含一个或多个`FRAME`元素，其中每个承载其自己的文档。A Web page consists of a single document, or a `FRAMESET` containing one or more `FRAME` elements, each of which hosts its own document. Web 开发人员使用的框架集显示逻辑上相关的页并排显示 （例如，导航页旁的内容页）。Web developers use framesets to show logically related pages side by side (for example, a content page next to a navigation page). 当包含单个文档的页面时，您可以访问它通过的属性; 如果页面使用帧，你可以访问其文档，一直到集合，其中包含一个或多个对象。When a page consists of a single document, you can access it through the property of ; if the page uses frames, you can access their documents through the collection, which consists of one or more objects. 时您的主机控件在 Windows 窗体应用程序中，您可以选择使用标准 Windows 窗体类，如用户交互或，或可以使用方法定义实现此目的。When your host the control in a Windows Forms application, you can choose to interact with the user using standard Windows Forms classes, such as or , or you can use methods on defined for this purpose. 方法会显示一个简单的对话框，使用自定义文本和一个**确定**按钮;向用户提供自定义文本和文本输入的字段的行和的自定义文本会显示一个对话框和**确定**并**取消**按钮。The method presents a simple dialog box with custom text and an **OK** button; presents a line of custom text and a text input field to the user; and presents a dialog box with a line of custom text and **OK** and **Cancel** buttons. 可以使用来打开新窗口，其中包含新的文档。You can use to open new windows containing new documents. 将指定的 URL 加载到已命名的窗口中，如果尚不存在，请创建它，而始终在新创建的窗口中打开其 URL。 loads the specified URL into the named window, creating it if it does not already exist, while always opens its URL in a newly created window. ## Examples 下面的代码示例包含两个方法。The following code example contains two methods. 第一个名为窗口中打开 URL `displayWindow`，将创建与显示一个状态栏。The first opens a URL in a window named `displayWindow`, which it creates with a status bar displayed. 第二个在同一窗口中，打开另一个 URL，但指定应显示仅在位置栏。The second opens another URL in the same window, but specifies that only the location bar should be displayed. 请注意，首先打开 URL 是取决于的窗口和控件显示的维度。Notice that the dimensions of the window and the controls that are displayed depends on which URL is opened first. 该代码示例要求你的窗体包含名为控件`WebBrowser1`。The code example requires that your form contains a control named `WebBrowser1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来确定是否窗口已关闭。Use the property to determine if the window is already closed. 如果窗口已关闭，此方法不会影响。If the window is already closed, this method will have no effect. 当创建新的 windows 使用或，导致 HTML 文档对象模型以打开 Internet Explorer 的新实例。When you create new windows using or , causes the HTML Document Object Model to open a new instance of Internet Explorer. 如果不调用上所有已创建的窗口中，Internet Explorer 的此实例将保持运行状态甚至您的应用程序关闭后。If you do not call on all of the windows you have created, this instance of Internet Explorer will remain running even after your application closes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将打开一个窗口，并关闭它，如果用户在过去 5 分钟内没有使用它。The following code example opens a window, and closes it if the user has not used it in the past five minutes. 编写的代码示例时，窗体具有假设名为控件`WebBrowser1`、 一个名为`Button1`，和一个类名为`Timer1`。The code example was written under the assumption that your form has a control named `WebBrowser1`, a named `Button1`, and a class named `Timer1`. 若要成功运行此示例中，更改第一个参数提供给到有效的 URL。To run this example successfully, change the first argument supplied to to a valid URL. summary.span: 当窗口内部运行的脚本遇到运行时错误时发生。

span.span: Occurs when script running inside of the window encounters a run-time error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks HTML 页面可以包含脚本代码，通常用 JScript 或 VBScript 中，加载页面时执行。HTML pages can contain script code, usually written in JScript or VBScript, that executes when a page is loaded. 每当脚本遇到运行时错误时发生。 occurs whenever a script encounters a run-time error. 由于脚本代码是后期绑定，这意味着，对对象的调用不被解析直到运行时错误可能包括从引用 null 对象到调用未定义的属性或方法的所有内容。Because script code is late-bound, which means that calls against the object are not resolved until run-time, errors can include everything from referencing a null object to calling an undefined property or method. 可以设置属性的为 true，以便防止在 Internet Explorer 中的本机错误对话框中显示。You can set the property of to true in order to prevent the native error dialog box in Internet Explorer from displaying. ## Examples 下面的代码示例捕获结果在 HTML 页面上脚本尝试访问文档中未定义的对象的错误。The following code example traps the error that results when a script on an HTML page attempts to access an object that is not defined in the document. 页面必须是完全加载之前附加事件处理程序，否则该示例将不起作用。The page must be fully loaded before the event handler is attached, otherwise the example will not work. remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个`FRAME`是 windows 中定义一组`FRAMESET`。A `FRAME` is a set of windows defined within a `FRAMESET`. `FRAME`s 启用托管在单个文档内的多个文档。`FRAME`s enable hosting multiple documents within a single document. 每个`FRAME`被定义为拥有一定行和列宽度，并且是在相对于其他页上的位置`FRAME`中定义的 s `FRAMESET`; 的位置`FRAME`固定的尽管用户有时会使用鼠标游标扩大或收缩`FRAME`。Each `FRAME` is defined as possessing a certain row and column width, and is position on the page in relation to the other `FRAME`s defined within the `FRAMESET`; the position of a `FRAME` is fixed, although a user may sometimes use the mouse cursor to grow or shrink the `FRAME`. `IFRAME`是类似于的框架，但它不需要定位在固定位置。An `IFRAME` is similar to a frame, but it need not be anchored in a fixed position. 框架将包含的一个实例为每个`FRAME`或`IFRAME`网页中定义。Frames will contain one instance of for each `FRAME` or `IFRAME` defined within a Web page. ## Examples 下面的代码示例检查包含框架的页内的所有文档，并从将来检查每个页面创建一个表的所有传出的超链接。The following code example inspects each document within a page containing frames and creates a table of all of the outgoing hyperlinks from each page for future inspection. remarks.format: ## Remarks 将出现： will occur for: - 中的第一个窗口`FRAMESET`时`FRAMESET`首次加载。The first window in a `FRAMESET` when the `FRAMESET` first loads. - `FRAME` ，最后具有焦点时窗口包含控制转至前台。The `FRAME` that last had focus when the window containing the control is brought to the foreground. - 一个`FRAME`单击用户，但只有当用户单击不会将焦点置于该窗口中的某个元素。A `FRAME` clicked by the user, but only if the user's click does not put focus on an element within the window. 无法取消的默认操作为事件，或防止从浮升。You cannot cancel the default action for the event, or prevent it from bubbling. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`HtmlWindow1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `HtmlWindow1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件的工作原理类似于上的事件控件： 它表明它已安全地访问 HTML 文档内的元素。The event works similarly to the event on the control: it signals that it is safe to access HTML elements inside of the document. 无法取消的默认操作为事件。You cannot cancel the default action for the event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`HtmlWindow1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `HtmlWindow1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能使用到移动从屏幕的可见的边缘窗口; 此方法也是可通过脚本在网页上，并允许不受信任的脚本使 windows 不可见被视为不安全。You cannot use to move a window off of the visible edge of the screen; this method is also available through script on a Web page, and allowing untrusted script to render windows invisible is not considered secure. 将引发如果想要移动的窗口和其父窗口具有不同的顶级域。 will raise an if the window you are trying to move and its parent window have different top-level domains. 例如，如果您承载控件指向 a.adatum.com，创建一个新窗口中使用显示 b.adatum.com。For example, if you are hosting the control pointing to a.adatum.com, create a new window using to display b.adatum.com. 在这种情况下，这两个窗口被视为是相同的顶级域的一部分，不会引发异常。In this case, both windows are considered to be part of the same top-level domain, and the exception is not thrown. 但是，如果您调用若要显示 www,microsoft.com，两个窗口现在具有不同的顶级域和操作将导致要引发的异常。However, if you call to display www,microsoft.com, the two windows now have different top-level domains, and the operation will cause the exception to throw.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`url`参数指向 HTML 页，将销毁当前显示在窗口中的页面，并将其替换为新页面; 你的应用程序保存到旧的页中的托管 DOM 对象的任何引用将无效。If the `url` parameter points to an HTML page, the page currently displayed in the window will be destroyed and replaced with the new page; any references your application holds to managed DOM objects in the old page will not be valid. 如果`url`指向 Internet Explorer 无法显示的资源，用户将看到一个对话框，询问是否要打开应用程序，保存到磁盘，或取消下载操作之外的资源。If `url` points to a resource that cannot be displayed by Internet Explorer, the user will be presented with a dialog box asking whether to open the resource outside of the application, save it to disk, or cancel the download operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `target`参数可以以前调用的结果作为创建窗口命名。The `target` parameter can name a window that was created as the result of a previous call to . 该参数也可以指向通过单击超链接打开的窗口 (`A`元素) 或`FORM`元素使用`TARGET`属性在新窗口中打开其 URL。The parameter may also point to a window opened by clicking on a hyperlink (`A` element) or a `FORM` element that uses the `TARGET` attribute to open its URL in a new window. 以下 HTML 代码将打开一个名为的新窗口`orderWindow`当用户单击它：The following HTML code will open a new window named `orderWindow` when the user clicks it: `Click to Start Order` 如果提供的任何选项`windowOptions`参数，不包含任何选项，会自动禁用。If you supply any options for the `windowOptions` parameter, any option not included is automatically disabled. 换而言之，如果您仅通过指定`windowOptions`希望一个状态栏，然后在菜单栏、 工具栏、 标题、 滚动条等将不会显示除非你显式启用它们通过`windowOptions`。In other words, if you only specify by way of `windowOptions` that you want a status bar, then the menu bar, toolbar, title, scroll bars, and so on will not be displayed unless you explicitly enable them by way of `windowOptions`. 如果引用的文件`url`是某一 HTML 文件、 文本文件或内部 Internet Explorer 中，可以托管其他文件类型将显示在已命名的窗口中。If the file referenced by `url` is an HTML file, text file, or other file type that can be hosted inside of Internet Explorer, it will be displayed in the named window. 如果文件不能显示 Internet Explorer 内，并且尚不存在名为目标的窗口，则将会打开窗口时间只够用，Internet Explorer 才能下载资源;它将立即关闭之后。If the file cannot be displayed inside of Internet Explorer, and the window named by target does not already exist, then the window will open only long enough for Internet Explorer to download the resource; it will close immediately afterwards. 当创建新的 windows 使用或，它会导致 HTML 文档对象模型以打开 Internet Explorer 的新实例。When you create new windows using or , it causes the HTML Document Object Model to open a new instance of Internet Explorer. 如果不调用上所有已创建的窗口中，Internet Explorer 的此实例将保持运行状态即使你的应用程序已退出。If you do not call on all of the windows you have created, this instance of Internet Explorer will remain running even after your application has quit. 如果您使用加载在现有窗口中，URL`windowOptions`将被忽略; 窗口将保留维度、 外观和首先由首次调用给出的屏幕位置。If you use to load a URL in an existing window, `windowOptions` will be ignored; the window will retain the dimensions, appearance, and screen location first given it by the initial call to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `target`参数可以以前调用的结果作为创建窗口命名。The `target` parameter can name a window that was created as the result of a previous call to . 该参数也可以指向通过单击超链接打开的窗口 (`A`元素) 或`FORM`元素使用`TARGET`属性在新窗口中打开其 URL。The parameter may also point to a window opened by clicking on a hyperlink (`A` element) or a `FORM` element that uses the `TARGET` attribute to open its URL in a new window. 以下 HTML 代码将打开一个名为的新窗口`orderWindow`当用户单击它：The following HTML code will open a new window named `orderWindow` when the user clicks it: `Click to Start Order` 如果提供的任何选项`windowOptions`参数，不包含任何选项，会自动禁用。If you supply any options for the `windowOptions` parameter, any option not included is automatically disabled. 换而言之，如果您仅通过指定`windowOptions`希望一个状态栏，然后在菜单栏、 工具栏、 标题、 滚动条等将不会显示除非你显式启用它们通过`windowOptions`。In other words, if you only specify by way of `windowOptions` that you want a status bar, then the menu bar, toolbar, title, scroll bars, and so on will not be displayed unless you explicitly enable them by way of `windowOptions`. 如果引用的文件`url`是某一 HTML 文件、 文本文件或内部 Internet Explorer 中，可以托管其他文件类型将显示在已命名的窗口中。If the file referenced by `url` is an HTML file, text file, or other file type that can be hosted inside of Internet Explorer, it will be displayed in the named window. 如果文件不能显示 Internet Explorer 内，并且尚不存在名为目标的窗口，则将会打开窗口时间只够用，Internet Explorer 才能下载资源;它将立即关闭之后。If the file cannot be displayed inside of Internet Explorer, and the window named by target does not already exist, then the window will open only long enough for Internet Explorer to download the resource; it will close immediately afterwards. 当创建新的 windows 使用或，它会导致 HTML 文档对象模型以打开 Internet Explorer 的新实例。When you create new windows using or , it causes the HTML Document Object Model to open a new instance of Internet Explorer. 如果不调用上所有已创建的窗口中，Internet Explorer 的此实例将保持运行状态即使你的应用程序已退出。If you do not call on all of the windows you have created, this instance of Internet Explorer will remain running even after your application has quit. 如果您使用加载在现有窗口中，URL`windowOptions`将被忽略; 窗口将保留维度、 外观和首先由首次调用给出的屏幕位置。If you use to load a URL in an existing window, `windowOptions` will be ignored; the window will retain the dimensions, appearance, and screen location first given it by the initial call to . ## Examples 下面的代码示例包含两个方法：The following code example contains two methods: - 第一个名为窗口中打开 URL `displayWindow`，将创建与显示一个状态栏。The first opens a URL in a window named `displayWindow`, which it creates with a status bar displayed. - 第二个在同一窗口中，打开另一个 URL，但指定应显示仅在位置栏。The second opens another URL in the same window, but specifies that only the location bar should be displayed. 请注意，首先打开 URL 是取决于的窗口和控件显示的维度。Notice that the dimensions of the window and the controls that are displayed depends on which URL is opened first. 该代码示例要求你的窗体包含名为控件`WebBrowser1`。The code example requires that your form contains a control named `WebBrowser1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 将导致要滚动，以便在文档上的指定的坐标位于文档的窗口的左上角中的文档。 will cause the document to scroll so that the specified coordinate on the document is located in the upper-left corner of the document's window. 如果文档不是很长或宽这种情况发生，将尽最大可能在指定方向文档中滚动。If the document is not long or wide enough for this to happen, will scroll through the document as far as possible in the specified direction.
